page.title: 15Employment
page.content: There seems to be quite an even balance between the various areas of employment being:- Senior Management 14%; Sales Managers/Representatives 12%; Teaching 10%; Medical 10%; Secretarial 9%; Retail Trade 8%; Engineers 8%; Catering 7%; Farming 6%; Building 6%; Law 4%; Unemployed 6%; Retired 11%. Amongst these people 20% are self- employed. Most people travel to work by car, a few travel by van, or bicycle, about 20% walk. Distances people travel to work varies, about 35% work locally, 20% travel up to 15 miles and 45% travel more than 15 miles. There are a few people who work away all week and come home to the tranquility of the country at weekends.
